pages.text: Reverium is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Reverium can be obtained by crafting together profanum, antiprism, and angel feathers.$(br2)Reverium can only be obtained after defeating the Shadow Wizards.

pages.title: Reverium
pages.text: Reverium holds the power of the heavens.
This metal has no smithing template, instead, you must make the toolset and armor with just the ingots alone.
